item.title: Designing a COVID-19 WebGIS Application: Unforgettable Internship Experience
item.description: Interning at PT Sketsa Negeri Mandiri in 2020 was no ordinary experience. Alongside one team member, I had the opportunity to contribute to an important project: building the COVID-19 WebGIS application. Whatâ€™s COVID-19 WebGIS? Imagine an online platform displaying COVID-19 data in Indonesia visually, complete with maps, charts, and analysis. Yes, that’s the COVID-19 WebGIS, a web-based application that helps users understand the pandemic situation better. Tech and Challenges This application leverages advanced technology, including:
